Name: Maureen And Mike Mansfield
BioText: She was the beloved wife of 68 years to Senator Mike Mansfield; dear mother of Dr. Anne Mansfield and dear grandmother of Caroline Marris.  The 1910, 1920, 1930 and 1940 Censuses indicate Maureeen was born in Washington State.  The family moved to Butte, Montana between 1905 and 1910.

Evan F. Schneider
BioText: Age 29. Trooper Evan Schneider was killed in an automobile accident on Highway 2 near Columbia Falls. His patrol car collided head-on with an oncoming vehicle.  Two occupants in the second vehicle were also killed.  Trooper Evan Schneider had served with the Montana Highway Patrol since January 2004. He is survived by...
